content: treat yourself with luxury crochet face scrubbies this lovely crochet face scrubby was designed to have texture - both for visual and touchable interest the puff stitches add a touch of luxury and using a soft cotton yarn ensures that the crochet face scrubby feels great to use from the start and bumps up the treat yourself feeling this crochet face scrubby pattern is designed in closed rounds and makes heavy usage of chain spaces to help with drying time ★skill level advanced beginner crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to *read a crochet pattern - there is not a video tutorial for this crochet face scrubby pattern *work the basic stitches - chain slip_stitch and single_crochet *work puff or be willing to learn *create chain 1 spaces and work into them *work in closed rounds that are not turned including how to slip_stitch to close a round etc this is not a beginner pattern absolute beginners will find this pattern outside of their skill level however the step by step photo tutorials through the pattern as well as for all special stitches and techniques will guide you through ★ pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorials for all special stitches special techniques and step by step through each round of the pattern this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with no photo tutorial to help save ink for crocheters who prefer to print their patterns ★terms used us standard - pattern is written in english ★size one size finished crochet face scrubby using this pdf pattern is approximately 4 inches in diameter ★materials required you will need a medium 4 cotton yarn of your choice to make your crochet face scrubbies you will need approximately 0 35 oz / 10g / 19 yards per scrubby made yarn used we crochet s dishie in colorways sunbaked orange kenai blue and linen cream this yarn is 100% cotton 190 yds / 100 g per skein ★tools 4 5 mm g-6 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you enjoy treating yourself with the radiant crochet face scrubby
